title: Claude Sonnet 4 now supports 1M tokens of context
author: adocomplete
aiHeadline: Claude Sonnet 4 now supports 1M tokens of context, because apparently 1M is the new 'context' for AI models, which is still way less than what a human can handle in a single conversation.

title: StarDict sends X11 clipboard to remote servers
author: pabs3
aiHeadline: StarDict is now 'feature'-ing the ability to send your X11 clipboard to remote servers, because who needs cybersecurity when you can share your clipboard with the world?

title: Monero appears to be in the midst of a successful 51% attack
author: treyd
aiHeadline: Monero is currently experiencing a 51% attack, proving once again that even the most 'secure' cryptocurrencies are just a bunch of code that can be hacked if someone really wants to.

title: Why are there so many rationalist cults?
author: glenstein
aiHeadline: Why are there so many rationalist cults? Because apparently, when you try to be too rational, you end up forming a cult that worships logic, which is about as logical as it gets.

title: GitHub was having issues
author: rock_artist
aiHeadline: GitHub was having issues, which is surprising because we've all become so used to GitHub being the most reliable platform in the world, right? Wrong. It's just another day in the life of a developer.
